com.mobixell.xtt
Class RTSPConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.mobixell.xtt.RTSPConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
RTSPConstants
public class RTSPConnection
extends Object
implements RTSPConstants

This class has been written as a replacement of javas rtsp class. It should do most of the job at the momment, including following a 301/302 redirect.

Version:
$Id: RTSPConnection.java,v 1.3 2010/03/18 05:30:40 rajesh Exp $
Author:
Roger Soder

createConnection

public RTSPConnection createConnection(String newname,
                                       String port)
Create a connection by reusing the configuration of this connection. Handy if you have a default connection and want to use its configuration as base.

getConnection

public static RTSPConnection getConnection(Map<String,RTSPConnection> connections,
                                           RTSPConnection defaultConnection,
                                           String[] parameters)

setHeader

public static void setHeader(Map<String,RTSPConnection> connections,
                             RTSPConnection defaultConnection,
                             String[] parameters)
set the RTSP headers to be sent from the client to the server.

Parameters:
parameters - array of String containing the parameters.
parameters[0] argument is always the method name,
parameters[1] connection name (or not present for default),
parameters[2] argument is the header key,
parameters[3] argument is the header value or not present removing.
If null is used as parameters it sends the allowed parameters list to the XTTProperties.printFail(java.lang.String) method and returns.

getConfigurationOptions

public static String getConfigurationOptions()
Returns the Configuration Options as a String ready to copy/paste in a configuration file
